How are you planning on protecting Ethereum from backbone providers who are handed court orders to shut it down?
So when I say “look, I think we are going to run into problems with backbone providers if Nazis start using Ethereum in a big way” LISTEN.
I think a risk would be that Ethereum traffic would get blocked by ISPs along with Tor and VPN traffic if there was a Nazi/crypto crackdown.
Problem is legal liability may attach itself (particularly in Germany) if Ethereum hosts Nazi content. I really don't know how it plays out.
Silk Road still hugely contaminates Bitcoin's reputation in the mainstream.
I.e. There could be a Nazi fork of Ethereum, but I don't want to see Ethereum logos treated as an alt right symbol one day, for example.
